title: GDB
details: A debugger for programs written in C and C++, allowing inspection of runtime behavior and memory.

title: Valgrind
details: A memory analysis tool used to detect memory leaks, invalid accesses, and memory management bugs.

title: Helgrind
details: A Valgrind tool used to detect race conditions and thread synchronization errors in multithreaded programs.

title: strace
details: A diagnostic tool that traces system calls and signals to help debug interactions with the kernel.

title: lsof
details: Lists open files and the processes that opened them, helpful for diagnosing resource usage issues.

title: perf
details: A Linux tool used to collect and analyze performance metrics of applications and system components.
